overview: Pedro is an average guy who can't seem to find a stable job and has the worst of luck. His landlord, Don Manuel, is an abusive crook who wants to steal Pedroâ€™s stuff and his girlfriend. Finally, when he's put in jail for a crime he didn't commit, Pedro decides that he's fed up and trains to become Chinche Man, the very first Honduran superhero.
title: Chinche Man
